title: Grayscale’s GBTC Sheds Over 13,700 BTC in 24 Hours Amid Rising Bitcoin ETF Competition
description: Prior to Wednesday’s market opening, Grayscale’s exchange-traded fund, GBTC, reported holding 605,890.87 bitcoin in reserves. However, according to the company’s most recent update, there has been a significant decrease in GBTC’s holdings, with a reduction of 13,793.09 bitcoin, valued at approximately $571 million. Major Outflows Hit Grayscale’s GBTC This recent decline in reserves marks another […]

title: Aggregate stablecoin supply sees largest increase since October
description: Glassnode data recorded a $4.1 billion monthly increase in the aggregate stablecoin supply, a 21-month high for fiat-pegged cryptocurrencies following bullish momentum.

title: US Treasury official calls for immediate crypto regulation
description: Graham Steele, U.S. Treasury Assistant Secretary for Financial Institutions, calls for establishing crypto regulation standards to preempt potential crises.

title: MetisDAO Launch Mystery: Can You Solve the 374% Price Puzzle?
description:
MetisDAO’s EDF launch propels METIS token surge, signaling strong market confidence. Despite a 24-hour dip, MetisDAO’s achievements in 2023 prime it for a bullish 2024 in DeFi. MetisDAO’s focus on scalability and security positions it as a key player in Ethereum Layer-2 solutions. The MetisDAO Foundation recently took a bold step in the cryptocurrency domain […]
